tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Ms. Meeks gave hardly any feedback! And when she did, it was weeks after the next paper was due. For example: by the time we turned in essay number 4, she was just grading essay number 2 resulting in you having NO idea what to do better on due to having no idea what you had done wrong. Would never take her class again.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She was a pretty good teacher and was fun to be around. She was relate-able and wanted to make sure everyone understood. She is a nice person, but does have her mind set on which professors she does not like and will tell you. She was a pretty good teacher and I would take her again if I could. Satisfied.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Each week, you are expected to do these pointless research logs with no explanation. She didn\'t grade anything until week 7 and gave poor feedback. Lacy is a tough grader, and I mean tough. I\'ve had really hard English professors, but have always gotten A\'s. This class I\'m not so sure. If you can avoid to take it with Meeks, then do.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This class was harder than I expected, especially for 3 credits. Good course content, but she\'s a hard grader for writing assignments. The biggest problem was that she didn\'t grade any of the writing assignments until the quarter was over, which make up most of the grade.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Online class. I appreciated her organization. Assignment due dates were predictable and the material was well organized so you wouldn\'t miss assignments. Writing my first paper over 8 pages, it was hard, but that was also because I picked a boring subject (my bad). If you are self motivated, I\'d recommend her. Use the tutor center for extra credit.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Great English teacher! Sometimes slow in posting grades or giving feedback; but she does quality teaching!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: She has really high expectations, but as long as you show up and ask questions you\'ll be fine. She\'s pretty entertaining too. Never bored in this class!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very little room to be creative in this class. Constantly got off topic during discussions. Constantly made excuses when she didn\'t get things graded in time. Not very organized. I felt as though she was controlling and cynical.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I found her to be really unorganized. She would give us information about formation that we needed for papers due that day. I often got marked down on things that she had not yet taught us. As for excitement and inters, she was easy to be around and talk to.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: The class wasn\'t organized well near the end of the quarter. We didn\'t write any essays until the last month of the class, which made it difficult to improve our abilities to write essays due to the lack of feedback on our prior work. This wouldn\'t be such a problem if the essays weren\'t worth so many points.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Really helpful teacher. Wants you to succeed and will answer all questions you have. You won\'t regret to have her as your English teacher.
